body:
Dear users,
Using instance I noticed that if I put -a into the transform field it
doesn`t work: how is it possible?

void instance ceiling
15 oct/namefile.oct -a 10 -t 1 0 0 -a 10 -t 0 1 0 -i 1
0
0

Thanks a lot

Roberto
